column4: [Q] Is there a way to scan for errors on a ext3 file system on the main drive?
Yes, just create an empty file named ( I think ) "forcefsck"  then reboot, let me check that file name though
Yup, that's the correct name so "sudo touch /forcefsck && sudo reboot" ( the second part will not ask you before rebooting so either be ready to reboot or leave it out and reboot on your own )
